select p.p_id ,p.p_name,pu.punit_name , p.p_price, p.p_coefficient ,p.p_cost ,p.p_size,c.comp_name , p.p_remark ,p.del_flag from product p left join product_unit pu on pu.punit_id =p.p_unit_id left join company c on c.comp_id =p.p_compid where p.p_name like #{pName} and c.comp_name like #{compName}
order by p.del_flag asc,p.p_name asc limit #{limit} offset #{page}
